search_results.title: New Gallup polling shows that Donald Trump is deeply ...
search_results.text: New Gallup polling shows that Donald Trump is deeply unpopular with the American people, both in general approval and on specific issues. 36% approval is still too high 😔 It's the 30-35% that keeps the rest of us up at night. There are still a shocking number of people who approve of what he is doing. It is mind boggling! Are the people who approve alive IMPEACH, REMOVE, CHARGE HIM WITH THE CRIMES HES COMMITTED, AND LOCK HIM UP!!! Worst President in American history Can someone impeach him already??????????? I will never forgive the people who voted for him and approve of him. PLEASE post this on Bluesky. Love the joy in Rachel's laugh.😊 He won’t make it the full term, just watch. Anyways, where’s the Epstein files? Worst President and administration ever. They only care about themselves. With the disgusting language he uses, his approval rating should be 0. Proof that Elon elected him by fixing the election. We laugh, say he’s crashing, click our tongues over his low approval , but no

Image: The Economist/Getty images
# 0 days into
Donald
Trump's term
The president's net approval rating isNaN%,
NaN%approve,NaN%disapprove,NaN%not sure
Last updated on December 10th 2025
## Net approval rating, % points
### By state
By demographic
Most important issues
Donald Trumpre-entered the Oval Office in January with a net approval rating of positive 6. Since then it has fallen, interrupted only by brief upticks. By early December it had dropped to -18. His polling numbers had only been that low once in his second term, back in October. This week it climbed back a bit, to -16.
Americans are especially dissatisfied with Mr Trump’s handling of inflation and the economy. Democrats have had some success focusing on “affordability”. Mr Trump has decried it as a “con job”. On December 9th he held a rally in Monroe County— Pennsylvani

# CNN Poll of Polls: Trump approval rating
[]()
Link Copied!
Presidential job approval ratings are one of the few metrics consistently and similarly measured in nearly all major public polls. An average of recent polls can often paint a more reliable picture of how the public views the president than a single poll can. metadata.title: What will be Donald Trump's approval rating be on December 14, 2025?
metadata.resolution_criteria: This question resolves as the approval rating for Donald Trump shown at the Silver Bulletin's [How popular is Donald Trump?](https://www.natesilver.net/p/trump-approval-ratings-nate-silver-bulletin) tracker for December 14, 2025, when accessed by Metaculus on or after December 15, 2025.
metadata.fine_print: In case of conflicts between the value shown in the chart and the csv file under the chart ("Get the data"), the csv file takes precedence. Additionally, if the csv's value is at least 4 significant figures, then its value is used for resolution. For example, as of November 30, 2025, the value shown for November 29, 2025 was 41.19%.
